description: <p>Are you looking to join a friendly and supportive multidisciplinary team? If so, an exciting opportunity has arisen for a band 5 nurse at The Sainsbury Wing; a dedicated private facility within Hammersmith Hospital.<br /> <br /> The Sainsbury wing is a 26 bedded mixed speciality area which includes haematology, hepatobiliary, gynaecology, cardiology and upper GI, with an ambulatory care unit and an outpatient department. We care for patients undergoing complex surgeries, out-patient chemotherapy and we manage patients’ symptoms caused by their treatment or cancer. <br /> <br /> This is an excellent opportunity to develop your skills and experience the best of both worlds with Imperial Private Healthcare, by providing first-class private care within trusted NHS hospitals. <br /><br /> About you:<br /> <br /> • Proactive with a desire to continuously improve patient experience and deliver high quality, patient-centred care.<br /> • Enthusiastic and highly-motivated.<br /> • Excellent communications skills and the ability to demonstrate a professional and sensitive manner with patients.<br /> • Ability to maintain accurate electronic records.<br /> <br /> Benefits we offer:<br /> <br /> • Join an established team of experienced nurses and allied health professionals.<br /> • Excellent educational development opportunities.<br /> • The opportunity to work across a broad range of specialities with a diverse patient group.<br /> • All NHS staff benefits including a generous pension scheme, staff accommodation, on-site nurseries, a childcare voucher scheme, season ticket loans, on-site gym facilities, a cycle to work scheme and a host of high street discounts.<br /> <br /> This post is a permanent full time position working with a mixed roster of long days and night shifts. <br /> <br /> For further details please contact:<br /> <br /> Dominique Anderson level 3 manager-Dominique.anderson@nhs.net<br /> Rebecca Foley-Saeed level 4 manager -rebecca.foley-saeed@nhs.net</p>
title: Band 5 Staff Nurse - PH
